{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = AVM FB W7590 AX 03.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX3600 WLAN Modem Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://en.avm.de/products/fritzbox/fritzbox-7590-ax/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = AVM |model = FRITZ!Box 7590 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = AX |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = HW259 |wlclass = AX36002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);GRX550A3;GRX550A3BC200, S0493N18, SLMQ4; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = IA |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 1.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;TC58BVG2S0HTA00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC256M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, VDSL2, ADSL2+, |addchip = 2.4GHz 802.11bgn/ax WLAN Front-end Module;Skyworks;SKY33021;;4;,,, 5GHz 802.11an/ac/ax WLAN Front-end Module;Qorvo;QPF4530;;4;,,, VDSL2 Super Vectoring Single Channel Line Driver;Microsemi;LE87271;;1;,,, VRX600 G.fast DSL Front-end;Intel;VRX619;VRX619, B1MC, SLMJK;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/25/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B095C6BF64 |asin_country = DE |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Lantiq (Intel);WAV614A1;WAV614A1MC, SLN24; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Lantiq (Intel);WAV624A1;WAV624A1MC, S9434L31, SLN25; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *{{boxmatrix|7590ax}} :CPU: GRX550A3 @1.0GHz (InterAptiv 34Kc); RAM: 512MB; Flash: 512MB (NAND) :mips34_512MB_grx5_dect446_5geth_2ab_isdn_nt_te_pots_2usb_host3_2wlan11ax
==See also== :;[https://avm.de/produkte/fritzbox/ FRITZ!Box Models]
*[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7590 AX]] - AX3600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7590]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7582]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(BCM63138, G.fast VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7580]] - AC2600 WLAN Modem Router :(4x4 MU-MIMO, VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7560]] - AC1300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2, VoIP, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7530 AX]] - AX2400 WLAN Modem Router :(2x3 MU-MIMO, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7530]] - AC1300 WLAN Modem Router :(2x2 MU-MIMO, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7510]] - AX600 WLAN Modem Router :(2,4GHz, VDSL-35b/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7430]] - N450 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, VoIP/DECT, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 7390]] - N300 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL, DECT-Basis, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 5490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, VoIP, Media Server) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4040]] - AC1300 WLAN Router :(GbE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0/3.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 4020]] - N450 WLAN Router :(FE WAN, 4x LAN, USB 2.0, Mediaserver) *[[AVM FRITZ!Box 3490]] - AC1750 WLAN Modem Router :(VDSL/ADSL2+, 4x GbE LAN, Mediaserver)
